eyata sambandha wimata kamaththak dakwana lama nalu niliyanta chayarupayakda samanga mema masa 23 wanida enam ena irida jathika chithrapata sansthawata pamina mulika sammukha parikshanayata paminenna yayi ema aayathanaya aaradhana karayi.prawina natyawedi bandula withanage ge nawathama natya nirmanaya ‚Äòromaya gini gani ‚Äì 2‚Äô desambar 23 wanida bibila, wijayamuni soyisa sanskruthika mandirayedi wedika gathawe.shri lanka guwan widuli sansthawa pracharaya karana ‚Äòhanda mama‚Äô lama wadasatahanata wasara 50 k sapirima nimiththen heta (21 da) ‚Äòhanda mama swarna jayanthi samaruma‚Äô janadhipathi aarya shiranthi rajapaksha mahathmiyage pradhanathwayen guwan widuli sansthawe aananda samarakon madiriyedi pawathwe.1963 desambar 14 wanida ‚Äòhanda mama‚Äô lama wadasatahana aarambha kala athara eda sita ada dakwa eya nirmanaya karana ladde madhyawedini sumana jayathilaka mahathmiya wisini.50 wani wasara nimiththen lamun wenuwen pawath wu kathandara tharagaye jayagrahaka lamun dasa denekuta swarna jayanthi samarumedi shishyathwa pirinamimata niyamitha athara ema athpitapath idiriyedi mudranaya sandaha godage poth samagamata bharadimata niyamithaya.
